languages.text: Мрачное одеяние посвященного Кровавой паутины наполняет врагов ужасом, а последователей Неумирающего — благоговейным трепетом. Ибо костяная броня, обтянутая тонкой кожей, выдает в носителе посланника самой смерти.

The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.
languages.original_text: Мрачное одеяние посвященного Кровавой паутины наполняет врагов ужасом, а последователей Неумирающего — благоговейным трепетом. Ибо костяная броня, обтянутая тонкой кожей, выдает в носителе посланника самой смерти.

traits.locale_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire fills enemies with terror and followers of the Undying One with pious trepidation. For the bone armour covered tightly in thin leather identifies its wearer as a messenger of death itself.

The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

languages.text: La imagen de la siniestra indumentaria de un iniciado de la Red Sanguinolenta inspira terror en sus enemigos y emoción en los seguidores del Inmortal. Esta armadura de hueso, recubierta de cuero fino, identifica al portador como emisario de la misma muerte.
languages.original_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

traits.locale_text: La imagen de la siniestra indumentaria de un iniciado de la Red Sanguinolenta inspira terror en sus enemigos y emoción en los seguidores del Inmortal. Esta armadura de hueso, recubierta de cuero fino, identifica al portador como emisario de la misma muerte.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの伝授者の不気味な装束を見ると、彼らの敵は恐怖を覚え、不死の者の信者は信仰的な畏れを抱く。薄い革でしっかりと覆われた骨の鎧は、着用者自身が死の死者であることを示すためだ。
languages.original_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの伝授者の不気味な装束を見ると、敵は恐怖を覚え、不死の者の信者は信仰的な畏れを抱く。薄い革の鞘にしっかりと収められた骨の鎧は、着用者自身が死の死者であることを示すためだ。

languages.text: 织血罗网教派的恐怖装束会让敌人感到恐惧，也会让不死之神的追随者感到虔诚的敬畏。这套骨甲裹着薄薄的皮革，表明穿戴者正是死亡的使者。
languages.original_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

traits.locale_text: 织血罗网教派的恐怖装束会让敌人感到恐惧，也会让不死之神的追随者感到虔诚的敬畏。这套骨甲裹着薄薄的皮革，表明穿戴者正是死亡的使者。

languages.text: Der Anblick der düsteren Kleidung eines Novizen des Blutgesponnenen Netzes löst Entsetzen in den Feinden und fromme Beklommenheit in den Anhängern des Todlosen aus, denn die Rüstung aus Knochen, die eng mit dünnem Leder umwickelt sind, identifiziert den Träger als Boten des Todes.
languages.original_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

traits.locale_text: Der Anblick der düsteren Kleidung eines Novizen des Blutgesponnenen Netzes löst Entsetzen in den Feinden und fromme Beklommenheit in den Anhängern des Todlosen aus. Die Rüstung aus Knochen, die eng mit dünnem Leder umwickelt sind, identifiziert den Träger als Boten des Todes.

languages.text: La simple vue de la tenue des adeptes de la Toile de Sang inspire autant la terreur chez leurs ennemis qu'une certaine inquiétude chez les fidèles de l'Immortel, car cette armure d'os bardée de cuir fin identifie son porteur comme un messager de la mort elle-même.
languages.original_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

traits.locale_text: La seule vue de l'attirail sinistre d'un initié de la Toile de Sang suffit à inspirer la terreur à ses ennemis et une sainte appréhension aux disciples de l'Immortel, car cette armure d'ossements étroitement gainés de cuir identifie instantanément son porteur comme un messager de la mort elle-même.

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı zangocunun ürkütücü kıyafetinin görüntüsü, düşmanlarının yüreklerini korkuyla doldurup Ölmeyen'in takipçilerini dinî bir ürpertiye boyun eğdirdi. Çünkü ince deriyle sıkı sıkıya sarılmış kemikten yapılma bu zırh, sahibini ölümün müjdecisi ilan eder.
languages.original_text: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.
